introUnderBanner.title: Build Your Brand and Marketing Strategy
introUnderBanner.text: The restaurant world has undergone a real revolution in recent years, both in concept and management. But few establishments have adapted to the new times. RestaurantDesignBar provides a modern vision on branding and marketing issues and help restaurants and food brands convert customers into loyal ambassadors.

left.title: Full-Service
left.text: Choose our Full-Service and we will develop, test, and execute your complete branding and marketing strategy for a flexible or fixed number of hours a week. This covers everything you need, such as branding, promotion, website development, design, and advertising.
left.check1: Access to our time and project completion tracking software.
left.check2: Single point of contact. We will assign a project manager to you.
left.check3: Full-Service handles branding and strategy for you. Everything!
left.check4: Allows restauranteurs to focus on main restaurant operations vs staying current with digital trends.
left.check5: No annual fees, no minimum weekly hours, no setup fee. Grow week by week.

right.title: Project-Based
right.text: Everything starts with the idea that each customer is a special project. A social media post, a flyer with a QR code, an online store, a corporate video, etc. With this “a la carte” service, our team produces an eye-catching design.
right.check1: Each design adheres to your branding. You will work directly with the designer.
right.check2: Quick turnaround times. You will have a first draft within the first 24 hrs.
right.check3: Unlimited revisions. Request unlimited changes to a work, before it is accepted.
right.check4: Own the copyrights of every created work
right.check5: No annual fees, no minimums, no setup fee. Pay as you order. Create an account for a discount.
